bibl.title: The 'Horhotep Letters' from the Sacred Animal Necropolis at North Saqqara.
bibl.note: Edition of 4 letters found at the Sacred Animal Necropolis at North Saqqara and problaby dating from the fourth-mid third century BC. All four letters belons to Horhotep's archive. - Introduction. - The letters: 1. P. Saqqara Inv. 1972/3 DP 19 [6155]; - 2. 1972/3 DP 18 [6154]; - 3. 1972/3 DP 23 [6159]; - 4. Inv. 1971/2 DP 124+128 [5810+5814.] - Avec résumés en anglais et en arabe.
bibl.seg: H.S. Smith, Cary J. Martin & Sue Davis, The 'Horhotep Letters' from the Sacred Animal Necropolis at North Saqqara.

Edition of 4 letters found at the Sacred Animal Necropolis at North Saqqara and problaby dating from the fourth-mid third century BC. All four letters belons to Horhotep's archive. - Introduction. - The letters: 1. P. Saqqara Inv. 1972/3 DP 19 [6155]; - 2. 1972/3 DP 18 [6154]; - 3. 1972/3 DP 23 [6159]; - 4. Inv. 1971/2 DP 124+128 [5810+5814.] - Avec résumés en anglais et en arabe.
